text.text_translated:
We have bought many things in our lives.  
Some of them are not used well.  

We may have a thick wool coat, but we do not wear it because we live in a hot country.  
We thought it looked nice, despite the fact that it is not good.  

We may have an old phone.  
We keep it after we buy a new phone, but we use it little.  

We may have a car, but we only drive it on weekends.  

We may have a guest room.  
We turn it into a storeroom.  

All these things are not put to good use.

best_attempt.text_translated: If we look at the things we own, we see a problem. We buy many things in our lives. Some of them we do not use for their purpose. For example, we may buy a thick wool coat. We buy it because it looks trendy. But we do not use the coat in a hot country. We may keep an old phone after we buy a new one. We use the old phone little. We may have a car that we drive only on weekends. We may have a guest room that we turn into a storeroom. We buy all these things but do not use them well.
